item.title: [C++] Building twitcurl Library in Unix platform
item.description: Download twitcurl source from https://github.com/swatkat/twitcurl using Git client. git clone https://github.com/swatkat/twitcurl.git In Unix shell, cd into libtwitcurl directory. Compile all of the twitcurlsource files into object files. g++ -Wall -fPIC -c -I. twitcurl.cpp oauthlib.cpp urlencode.cpp base64.cpp HMAC_SHA1.cpp SHA1.cpp Building twitcurl asstatic library: Use the archive commandto build twitcurl library from object files. ar rvs libtwitcurl.a *.o
